description:
Shinazugawa Sanemi is a Demon Slayer and the Wind Pillar of the http://anidb.net/ch104028 [Demon Slaying Corps].[1] He is also the older brother of http://anidb.net/ch101645 [Shinazugawa Gen`ya], the only other surviving family member he has.
Source: Kimetsu no Yaiba Wiki
name: Shinazugawa Sanemi
